headline: Microsoft Ties Xbox Leadership To AI Cloud And Security Ambitions
summary: Microsoft (NasdaqGS:MSFT) announced a leadership transition in its Gaming division, with Xbox chief Phil Spencer retiring and Asha Sharma taking over. Sharma previously led Microsoft’s CoreAI group, bringing an AI focused background into the gaming business. The company also announced expanded partnerships, including work with CrowdStrike on AI driven cybersecurity and with Ericsson on enterprise 5G integration. For you as an investor looking at Microsoft, this move ties one of its most...
